answers.text: It provides outbound-only Internet communication over IPv6 and is designed for IPv6 traffic only.
Egress-Only Internet Gateways allow you to associate a security group whereas that's impossible to do with a NAT Gateway.
It provides outbound-only Internet communication over IPv6 & IPv4 and is designed for IPv6 and IPv4 traffic.
It's a cheaper alternative to the more expensive NAT Gateway Service.

text: What is the purpose of using an Egress-Only Internet Gateway in AWS?
